usage.eng: Grow old along with me, the best is yet to be.

usage.cn: 微笑是任何场合下，你能做出的最佳反应。
usage.eng: Smiling is the best reaction in all situations.

usage.cn: 忘记某个人最好的方法，就是喜欢上其他人。
usage.eng: The best way to get over someone, is to get under someone else.

usage.cn: 最好的感觉是当你朝他看过去时，他已经在凝视着你。
usage.eng: The best feeling is when you look at him and he is already staring.
